description: Dashboard for spring boot services. Displays standard spring metrics, jvm metrics, important data from kubernetes. Grafana 10+. Up-to-date original version is here https://github.lmru.tech/adeo/lmru--sv-grafana-dashboards/

panels.description: P99, P95, P50 of response times
panels.title: Client Latency From All URI

panels.description: P99, P95, P50 of response times
panels.title: Average Client Latency

targets.expr:
sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", status="200"}[5m]))
/
sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", status!="CLIENT_ERROR"}[5m]))
*100

sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", status!="CLIENT_ERROR"}[5m])) by (status) / scalar(sum(increase(http_client_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", status!="CLIENT_ERROR"}[5m])) by (service))

sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m])) by (status) / scalar(sum(increase(http_server_requests_seconds_count{namespace="$namespace", service="$app", pod=~"$pod", uri!~"$excluded_urls"}[5m])) by (service))

title: PerfSCM
